description: Lists summary information about the instances that you registered by using a specified service.

parameters.name: ServiceId
parameters.description: The ID of the service that you want to list instances for.

parameters.name: NextToken
parameters.description: For the first ListInstances request, omit this value. If more than MaxResults instances match the specified criteria, you can submit another ListInstances request to get the next group of results. Specify the value of NextToken from the previous response in the next request.

nested_items.name: Instances
nested_items.description: Summary information about the instances that are associated with the specified service.

nested_items.name: Id
nested_items.description: The ID for an instance that you created by using a specified service.

nested_items.name: Attributes
nested_items.description: A string map that contains the following information:
The attributes that are associated with the instance.
For each attribute, the applicable value.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: If more than MaxResults instances match the specified criteria, you can submit another ListInstances request to get the next group of results. Specify the value of NextToken from the previous response in the next request.
